bibl.title: Heteroclisis in Menander and the Authorship of P. Ant. 15 (= fr. com. adesp. 1084 K.-A.).
bibl.note: 1. Heteroclisis: a preliminary definition. - 2. The data. - 3. The authorship of P. Ant. I, 15 (= M.-P.3 1320.3; LDAB 2707). The text cannot be by Menander.
